title: Civilization Race of Nations (Windows board game)
description: In the game "Civilization: Race of Nations" you are leading an ancient civilization. Your task is to lead it through next eras, so it may become most glorious and advanced empire. To do so, you must construct new buildings: mines, farms, libraries and laboratories. You also must hire and feed new workers and research new technologies. As a good lord you have to take care after your subjects by providing them entertainment. However, you must not forget about your sovereignty. Military force is vital and winning a war can grant your civilization glory for aeons
